The goal of the game is to get to, or approach as close to twenty one (21) as possible, without going over. You must have at least 15 points, 22 are two many. Two Aces are worth 21 points. You start the game with a deck of 33 cards. When you think you have good chances of winning, tap End Turn. Then it is the machine's turn.
Card face values:
- Unter: 2 points - Ober: 3 points - King: 4 points - Weli (VI) 6 points (only one per deck!) - Seven (VII): 7 points - Eight (VIII): 8 points - Nine (IX): 9 points - Ten (X): 10 points - Deuce: 11 points (But: two aces win!)
